column1:
amanda113122,"2020-07-10T22:20:46.273Z","Bionicle Clock","

I just got this clock to help others to update info on this product.
This set has 20 pieces including a free AA battery. Comes with instruction and an illustration of the clock. It had a 1 year guarantee warranty.
It was produced by QPF UK Ltd. under license from the LEGO Group.
It seems you will get a random Noble Kanohi Ruru (likely for the international set. Need to confirm on that.) or Kanohi Miru.
Both Kanohi are red color as shown on pictures on the internet and the back of the box.
No other changes to the clock other than that piece.
The box I have, has an old department store'
column2: s price sticker which retail the clock at $29.99 in 2002.
